steps.title: Cut the ends of the bananas.
steps.content: Cut the ends of the bananas.

steps.title: Make two cuts along the length of the banana, on opposite sides.
steps.content: Make two cuts along the length of the banana, on opposite sides. The cut should only go as deep as the skin. Do not remove the skins. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place the bananas in boiling water and cover for 15 minutes.
steps.content: Place the bananas in boiling water and cover for 15 minutes. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Drain the water and peel the bananas.
steps.content: Drain the water and peel the bananas.

steps.title: In the same pot, place 8 cups of water and 2 tbsp of salt and bring to a boil.
steps.content: In the same pot, place 8 cups of water and 2 tbsp of salt and bring to a boil.

steps.title: Place the bananas in the boiling water and cover them.
steps.content: Place the bananas in the boiling water and cover them.

steps.title: Boil gently for 10 minutes.
steps.content: Boil gently for 10 minutes. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Add 1 cup of cold water and boil for another 5 minutes.
steps.content: Add 1 cup of cold water and boil for another 5 minutes.

steps.title: Drain and let the bananas cool.
steps.content: Drain and let the bananas cool.

steps.title: Cut into one-inch slices and place them into a glass or porcelain container.
steps.content: Cut into one-inch slices and place them into a glass or porcelain container. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Place garlic, sweet peppers and peppercorns into a mortar and crush with a pestle.
steps.content: Place garlic, sweet peppers and peppercorns into a mortar and crush with a pestle. If you don't have a mortar and pestle, give them a few pulses in a food processor or blender. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Add olive oil, lime juice, vinegar and 1 tsp of salt.
steps.content: Add olive oil, lime juice, vinegar and 1 tsp of salt. Mix well.

steps.title: Add the sauce to the green bananas and toss to mix well.
steps.content: Add the sauce to the green bananas and toss to mix well. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Serve promptly with cocktail toothpicks.
steps.content: Serve promptly with cocktail toothpicks. [7] X Research source
